author: Staff Reporter
text: A construction worker was injured when a heavy stone fell on him at Pallavaram railway station on Wednesday evening. Sheikh Kakul Mulla (24) was injured on his face and hand, the police said. He was among a group of workers engaged in building a ticket booking counter when the incident took place. Suburban train services between Tambaram and Pallavaram were delayed by 20 minutes.
title: Worker injured
